nodes.text: This woman was the commanding officer of the EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate Redemption during the Galactic Civil War.

The captain of the Redemption first appeared in Star Wars: Rogue Squadron II: Rogue Leader, in which she was voiced by Lynne McClean. The character is not named in the game, and is not shown, with only her voice heard over the comlink during missions.
